CustomField.description: Contract dates are required to set an opportunity to stage 'Closed Won'.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Business-Professional Services"),IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"),
IF( OR( ISBLANK(End_date_contract__c), ISBLANK(Startdate_contract__c), AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL(Type,'New Business - Expansion Portal')), DAY(Startdate_contract__c) = DAY(End_date_contract__c))), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: Enter correct contract dates
CustomField.label: Check - Contract Dates
